name: A necklace made of gold and onyx
data: It increases the users wisdom noticably.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
The souls of the seven sorcerers bound into the stones of this necklace
occasionally grant a fraction of their wisdom to the bearer.
